data.name: 0006 (360.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: At this point, no one had yet realized how serious this was about to get.

data.name: 0008 (360.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hold on, you're kidding, right?

data.name: 0009 (360.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The entire school's data links have become unstable.

data.name: 0010 (360.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The emblem drawn by Haruhi Suzumiya acted as a trigger.

data.name: 0011 (360.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It caused the data lifeforms to increase their activity.

data.name: 0012 (360.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Just like before.

data.name: 0017 (360.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes, Suzumiya!

data.name: 0002 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ghost stories are as suited to the middle of summer as snow is to Christmas!

data.name: 0003 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Thus I present a classroom which should not exist: "Class 1-10."

data.name: 0021 (360.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huhhhh?!

data.name: 0026 (360.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What do you mean…?

data.name: 0027 (360.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: She wants it to be real.

data.name: 0028 (360.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We may see a ghost or other unnatural phenomenon manifest right before our eyes.

data.name: 0030 (360.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ahhh, scaryyy!

data.name: 0031 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nice expression, Mikuru!

data.name: 0032 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It will look perfect when I place it in the SOS Brigade activity record!

data.name: 0000 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's time for the SOS Brigade Summer Training Camp Part 2!

data.name: 0001 (360.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It all started with a single sentence from Haruhi…

data.name: 0004 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A legendary "man-eating classroom" from which no one who's wandered in has returned.

data.name: 0005 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: As one of the new seven wonders of North High, we, the SOS Brigade, will investigate it!

data.name: 0016 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First, we should investigate the scene. Let's go, Mikuru!

data.name: 0018 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A man-eating classroom, huh? It's simple, but on the other hand, it's scary.

data.name: 0019 (360.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: A-are we all going to get eaten?

data.name: 0020 (360.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The first to be attacked is always the brat or the beautiful maiden—it's a horror staple.

data.name: 0025 (360.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya's words and actions are starting to have an impact on the real world.

data.name: 0035 (360.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Let's try to keep her attention as far away from it as possible.

data.name: 0037 (360.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: During that time, we'll process the abnormal space that's appeared—

data.name: 0038 (360.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, I suppose you could say everything is as usual.

data.name: 0036 (360.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As long as Suzumiya is enjoying the summer camp, our situation shouldn't get any worse.

data.name: 0040 (360.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what's this?! This wasn't here before!

data.name: 0041 (360.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Haruhi Suzumiya's words are influencing the space.

data.name: 0042 (360.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what should I do, Nagato?!

data.name: 0043 (360.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Points securing the space must be destroyed.

data.name: 0044 (360.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're asking me to… do that?

data.name: 0045 (360.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It's okay. I'll support you.

data.name: 0046 (360.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you serious…?

data.name: 0047 (360.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
